me.realized.duels.api.user

Interface User


  • public interface User
    Represents a User loaded on the server.

    • Method Summary

      • canRequest

        boolean canRequest()
        Whether or not this user is receiving duel requests.
        Returns:
        True if this user has requests enabled. False otherwise.

      • setRequests

        void setRequests(boolean requests)
        Enables or disables duel requests for this user.
        Parameters:
        requests - True to allow sending duel requests to this user. False otherwise.
